html:
7.2.20  12:52 am   why is the world round? 

      to blow your mind

7.2.20  12:25 am   Why is every video u make like an lsd fever dream

      just seems like common sense really

7.2.20  12:19 am   Have any tips for a novice attempting to make art of the visual and musical varieties?

      yes, keep a spreadsheet of which is art and which is music, without labeling the columns

7.2.20  12:19 am   How come some trees are big, but others are little?

      experimentation

7.1.20  11:44 pm   Why are the McDonalds ice cream machines always broken? 

      because they are too advanced

7.1.20  11:44 pm   is it finally time to move on from 12 tone equal temperament? just think of how much we could do with even more notes

      most people who use 12 tone already go pretty wild with every/all other notes available. especially using instruments such as voice, or trombone

7.1.20  11:43 pm   Hey Bill, how do you gain confidence to perform as yourself in front of the world?

      maybe just lose confidence in some of the many other things besides that

7.1.20  11:41 pm   Would you ever make a full feature film?

      not unless i can make more than 1

7.1.20  11:41 pm   Do you believe anyone can create good art or are some people born without the right set of skills

      everyone already is good art. all you have to do is be there. it just happens

7.1.20  11:33 pm   how big is your brain?

      not nearly as big as the rest of my body

7.1.20  11:26 pm   I've been drawing for a while online and on paper and I was wondering if I should try learning some 3D since your doing that too should I try?

      sure, if you don't mind being traumatized by how big the universe can be

7.1.20  10:54 pm   How can I deal with all these circles?

      you could make them into 10gons

7.1.20  10:36 pm   It's hard for me to finish a song that I created, help me pls :(

      make a documentary, about finishing the song. the audience can be in on the challenge. can be like a game show

7.1.20  10:33 pm   when is a bowling pin not a bowling pin?

      some other time

7.1.20  10:04 pm   what current video/video idea are you working on?

      rigging/movement implementation systems

7.1.20  9:45 pm  
favorite method to keep organized?

      put everything into a spiral shaped orbit

7.1.20  9:35 pm   How do you come up with video ideas?

      sometimes i pretend i'm in kansas and i'm supposed to decide which side of the road the land is on

7.1.20  9:33 pm   What are your thoughts on Kansas?

      the road reminds me of the line down the middle of the road, except instead of a line, it's the road down the middle of the land

7.1.20  9:23 pm   What else did the easter bunny tell you?

      that easter is actually part of a 4-quadrant matrix of holidays, which are all part of the same holiday, and are color coded by the predominant color of the candy packaging

7.1.20  9:20 pm   I just did a bad thing

      oh now you've got me wondering what the thing is

7.1.20  8:35 pm   How small is too small for the mall?

      medium sized

7.1.20  8:31 pm   Are spoons just portable bowls???

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.1.20  8:18 pm   What's invisible but you wish people could see?

      most things are visible

7.1.20  7:45 pm   are you undergoing mitosis 

      something quite similar actually

7.1.20  7:39 pm   favorite flavor of tree?

      LOD

7.1.20  7:33 pm   What was your second favorite book when you were in Middle School? Third favorite in High School?

      i have no idea how to figure that out

7.1.20  6:48 pm   what do you think of Brazil?

      scientists believe that most of the world is Brazil

7.1.20  6:26 pm   how are you?

      pretty good

7.1.20  6:21 pm   why is life full of suffering?

      maybe this encourages you to invent goodness

7.1.20  5:31 pm   whats your opinion of 7

      fair, balanced,

7.1.20  5:25 pm   What is a teaser about the next upload

      the next upload itself will be a teaser. there's going to be a lot of teasers, maybe 100 teasers. but, way more non-teasers, after that. that much i can promise

7.1.20  5:06 pm   How much will you redefine the genre of video when you finally release your new, revolutionary video? 

      wait hold on, you're acting like i'm only gonna make 1 video. i'll tell you one thing for sure, videos are way too awesome to make just 1

7.1.20  4:45 pm   How to get motivation to do something?

      have you thought about going for a promenade

7.1.20  4:32 pm   Are you learning 3d animations?

      oh that would explain a lot

7.1.20  4:30 pm   I'be been meaning to try and write songs, but have no motivation at all. is there anything I can do? 

      yes, try doing something else which you do have motivation to do. you will be happier that way for sure

7.1.20  4:29 pm   Why are the questions purple

      because i like purple and nothing else was purple on the website at the time this was made

7.1.20  3:31 pm   how big is the universe

      average sized

7.1.20  3:09 pm   How dark must a room be to make a song?

      sometimes it's cool if some of the room is light, and some of it's dark

7.1.20  2:59 pm   Are you making progress on the Thing?

      yes

7.1.20  2:00 pm   what do you know about argentina

      it's very majestic

7.1.20  1:42 pm   ever gone bowling without any pins?

      no but i've done it without the ball

7.1.20  1:12 pm   Do you ever get tired of people asking weird and nonsensical questions?

      no, each one makes me more awake

7.1.20  1:10 pm   have you ever been betrayed, abandoned, or otherwise made an incoherent fool out of?

      ha, i wish

7.1.20  12:43 pm   What do you do when you feel like your creativity is gone forever?

      turn to science, which tells us that it's there forever

7.1.20  12:38 pm   whats the word on the street

      SLOW

7.1.20  12:26 pm   Help I accidentally cast the pod too far

      that's fine. just reel it back in a bit

7.1.20  12:14 pm   what do you think of microtonality?

      i prefer using a variety of different sized tones

7.1.20  12:08 pm   what's the best and worst time of day

      day time

7.1.20  11:56 am   can you make a brand new word right here and now please? thank you

      sure, hbsguj2srargqhw

7.1.20  11:17 am   Will you make more videos soon?

      yep
